Articles.Content: I was thinking, with all the backlash about how the new aero "broke" SSTOs - basically, how a more realistic aero doesn't allow to use wings as decorations and to design based on rule of cool or crazyness, I wonder if someone is interested making an Old Aero mod for the people who liked it

What horrible nonsense is this? If it aint broke, break it?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T16:26:55Z" title="05/03/2015 04:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by Tex\_NL**
I can't imagine any modder who'd want to do this, but it should be relatively easy in the grand scheme of things.
Nope, I do not want the souposhere back, as much as it was fun to make weird stuff in...
